alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:31PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Elko County through 300 PM PDT... At 231 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Contact, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Elko County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
